articles.title: New crime docudrama adds insights to old cases including Geylang Bahru Tan Children Murders - AsiaOne
articles.description: As crime-solving technologies get more advanced, would it help shed some light on old criminal cases? A new Mediacorp docudrama Inside Crime Scene that was released on Friday (March 11) aims to provide new perspectives on six heinous crimes that shook Singapo…
articles.content:

articles.title: Actor Jussie Smollett sentenced to 150 days in jail in fake attack - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: After the sentencing, Smollett maintained his innocence and suggested he could be killed in jail.

articles.title: Sezairi celebrates becoming first Singapore artiste to hit 100 million streams on Spotify - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In an Instagram post announcing the news, the local singer said he wrote It’s You “with the conscious thought that I wanted to turn my life around and be a better person, husband, lover and human being”.
articles.content: Local singer Sezairi Sezali had a big announcement to make earlier this week. In a social media post on Monday (Mar 7), he wrote that he was the first Singapore artist to have 100 million streams for… [+533 chars]
